span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 促使……行动： to try to persuade (someone) through earnest appeals to follow a course of action
【例】 The strike may prod the government into action. 罢工也许会迫使政府采取行动。
【近】 encourage, exhort, goad, nudge, prompt, spur, egg on
【反】 rein 抑制

【记】 p音：扑 + rod 棍子→向前扑棍子→刺；看成poke rod
